Test Scenario Description: Verify that user is able to view all the fields
Verify that bottons and form fields are accessible or not.
Verify that required fields contains asterisk (*) or not.
Verify that error message are displayed for required fields when left blank.
Verify that proper error message is displayed when invalid information is entered.
Verify that proper success message is displayed when membership is created with valid information.
Verify that fields are aligned properly across different resolutions and devices.
Verify that form labels are visible and clear.
Verify that responsiveness of the "Apply Membership" page on diiferent devices(mobile,tablet,desktop).
Verify that the role name field can accept a valid role name.
Verify that error message should popup upon invalid role name.
Verify that the system prevents adding dupicate roles with the same name
Verify that system handles both the maximum and minimum character lengths for the role name.
Verify that permission can be selected using checkboxes.
Verify that the sub-permission option are automatically checked when the parent permission is selected.
Verify that the selected permission for the new role name  are saved automatically.
Verify that the form can be submitted successfully when all required fields are filled correctly.
Verify that the newly add name role is displayed in the role list.
Verify that a success message is displayed after adding a role.
Verify that error message should be displayed when required fields are left empty.
Verify that error message can appear when invalid data is entered.
Verify that error message are displayed for  each field left blank when attempting to submit the form.
Verify that the Edit Role form can be accessed successfully.
Verify that close button is clickable .
Verify that edit icon is clickable
Verify that after editing the changes are correct
Verify that the role name can be updated in the Role Name field
Verify that permission can be modified by selecting or deselecting checkboxes.
Verify that the form validates input and prevents submission if required fields are left empty.
Verify that role name can be updated  without any duplication.
Verify that form cannot be submitted if required fields are left empty.
Verify that error message is shown if the role name exceeds the maximum character .
Verify that error message is shown if the role name have  maximum character .
Verify that the form cannot be submitted if permission are not selected.
Verify that the updated permission are saved correctly after editing the role .
Verify that changes are reflected immediately in the system without needing to refresh the page.
Verify that success message is displayed after the role has been successfully edited.
Verify that updated role can be mention in the top or not.
Verify that the delete button is visible for each role in the navigation list.
Verify that the user can select multiple roles and click the Delete All button.
Verify that clicking the delete button shows a popup message.
Verify that after confirming the delete action, the selected role(s) are removed from the role management list
Verify that a success message is displayed after successfully deleting a role or multiple roles.
Verify that the user can deletes multipe role once at a time and confirming deletion.
Verify that role can be successfully deleted and no longer appear in the list.
Verify that once a role is deleted, it cannot be accessed by searching or navigation through the system.
Verify that a prompt asking for deletion confirmation appears when the delete button is clicked.
Verify that if proper  message is displayed when valid information is enetered.
Verify that if proper error message is displayed when invalid information is enetered.
Verify that if proper error message is displayed on required fields when blank form is submitted.
